UndoRedo

Interface GenericUndoRedoStack


  • public interface GenericUndoRedoStack

    Two Stacks passing AlterCommands between them. The AlterCommands each hold a piece of the objects state

    On call to undo() the old state is returned

    On call to undo() the old state is returned

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(AlterCommands.AlterCommand ai)
      Called on any change to a Picture object
      imageIO.Picture redoPicture(imageIO.Picture picture)
      Any redo method for the Picture object to revert to state before the last undo change.
      imageIO.Picture undoPicture(imageIO.Picture picture)
      Any undo method for the Picture object to revert to state before last change.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(AlterCommands.AlterCommand ai)
        Called on any change to a Picture object
        Parameters:
        ai - the AlterCommand to add to the UndoStack

      • undoPicture

        imageIO.Picture undoPicture(imageIO.Picture picture)

        Any undo method for the Picture object to revert to state before last change.

        Parameters:
        picture - a Picture whose change needs to be undone
        Returns:
        the passed in Picture with it's last change undone

      • redoPicture

        imageIO.Picture redoPicture(imageIO.Picture picture)

        Any redo method for the Picture object to revert to state before the last undo change.

        Parameters:
        picture - a Picture whose change needs to be redone
        Returns:
        the passed in Picture with its last undo redone
